targets.query: SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostmeta$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostmeta$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_users") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$metaID$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostmeta$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100-last(available_percent) FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostmeta$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$hostmeta$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostmeta$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean("available") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$metaID$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: Meta ID
list.name: metaID
list.query: show tag values from meta with key = "nodeID"

list.definition: select last("hostnameid") from meta where nodeID =~ /^$metaID$/
list.name: hostmeta
list.query: select last("hostnameid") from meta  where nodeID =~ /^$metaID$/
